summary: Three handicapped losers who form a band ask famous writer Dries to be their drummer. He joins the band and starts manipulating them.
cast: Dries Vanhegen|Norman Baert|Gunter Lamoot|Sam Louwyck|François Beukelaers|Bernadette Damman|Joris Van Der Speeten|Nancy Denijs|Nomie Visser|Dolores Bouckaert|Wim Willaert|Barbara Callewaert|Jan Hammenecker|Vinnie Bonduwe|Chantal Wannyn|Tristan Versteven|Sebastien Dewaele|Hans Claerhout|Eric Vanrenterghem|Flip Kowlier|Frank Dubbe|Kurt Vandemaele|Sophia Theys|Peggy Heyninck|Patrick Cronenberg|Sylviane Aliet|Marcel Deblauwe|Greta Baert Bruynoghe|Vildan Maksuti
keywords: misogynist|homophobia|physical disability|mother son relationship|battle of the bands
title: Ex Drummer
